author: jstrachan
msg: Updated the build so that it now reuses the classpath created by the Maven build to allow compiled code to be run as part of the projects build.xml easily, without having to replicate the JAR dependencies that are inside the project.xml definition.
So its easy to add a new build target that runs a new Jelly script; the 'compile' task defines a new <jelly> task using the current build and Maven's classpath.

author: jstrachan
msg: Added 'dist' target to work nicely with gump
